Name Variants: In this column place name variants your institution is known by
Domains: In this column put all domain names that your institution owns or operates under, as may appear in URLs or email addresses
Grant Numbers: In this column place the grant numbers of any grants you wish to receive content for
ROR: In this column place all ROR institutional IDs you wish to match  with the RoR in the author affiliation in the articles' metadata
Ringgold: In this column place all Ringgold organisational IDs you wish to match with the Ringgold in the author affiliation in the articles' metadata
Excluded Name Variants: In this column place name variants you would like to exclude from the match. This is used after a match is made, to further refine the matching process and eliminate articles which you would like excluded, based on the `excluded name variants`
Excluded Domains: In this column place domains you would like to exclude from the match. This is used after a match is made, to further refine the matching process and eliminate articles which you would like excluded, based on the `excluded domains`

Name Variants: In order to use this template, please remove all content except the headers in row 1, and then complete the columns for each type.  You do not have to complete all of the columns if you do not wish to.  You can have as many or as few entries in each column as you like.
When exporting this CSV from your spreadsheet program, please ensure that you save it as a CSV with text encoding “UTF-8”
